This relationship may be directly between the schemas, or between specific properties of the schemas. profile-consents##description: This schema captures privacy, personalization and marketing preferences (consents).
profile-directmarketing##description: Use for direct marketing activities such as addresses, emails, and phone numbers.
profile-inferred-person##xdm:inferredAdd: Address details inferred by reverse IP lookup of the lead’s first recorded web visit.
profile-inferred-person##xdm:inferredCom: Company name inferred by reverse IP lookup of the lead’s first recorded web visit.
Status of the company name inferred by reverse IP lookup of the lead’s first recorded web visit.
profile-inferred-person##xdm:inferredMet: Metropolitan area inferred by reverse IP lookup of lead’s first recorded web visit.
profile-inferred-person##xdm:inferredPho: Phone area code inferred by reverse IP lookup of lead’s first recorded web visit.
profile-inferred-person##description: This mixin is used to capture inferred details about a person where they are not directly avaialble.
profile-internet-subscription##xdm:dataC: Captures the data cap limit for the account, in megabytes (MB).
profile-internet-subscription##xdm:conne: Tracks the type of connection type for the subscription.
profile-internet-subscription##xdm:downl: Records the maximum download speed available for the subscription, in megabytes (MB).
profile-internet-subscription##xdm:uploa: Records the maximum upload speed available for the subscription, in megabytes (MB).
profile-internet-subscription##xdm:selfS: Flags if a customer is eligible for internet setup without a technican visit.
profile-internet-subscription##descripti: Internet subscription plan details such as data cap, connection type, and speed details.
profile-landline-subscription##xdm:minut: Number of monthly minutes available within the subscription.
profile-landline-subscription##xdm:voice: Flags if the landline subscription features include Voicemail.
profile-landline-subscription##xdm:callF: Flags if the landline subscription features include Call Forwarding.
profile-landline-subscription##xdm:calle: Flags if the landline subscription features include Caller ID.
profile-landline-subscription##xdm:callB: Flags if the landline subscription features include Call Blocking.
profile-landline-subscription##xdm:callW: Flags if the landline subscription features include Call Waiting.
profile-landline-subscription##xdm:three: Flags if the landline subscription features include Three-Way Dialing.
profile-landline-subscription##xdm:inter: Flags if the landline subscription features include International Calling.
profile-landline-subscription##xdm:unlim: Flags if the landline subscription features include Unlimited Local Calling.
Flags if the landline subscription features include Unlimited Domestic Long Distance.
profile-landline-subscription##descripti: Landline subscription plan details including selected features, minutes, and dialing plans.
profile-loyalty-details##xdm:joinDate##d: Date which the visitor registered for the loyalty program.
profile-loyalty-details##xdm:loyaltyID##: The loyalty program ID(s) associated with a specific user, if they are enrolled in the client's loyalty program.
profile-loyalty-details##xdm:points##des: Current balance of the loyalty points/awards in a visitor's loyalty account.
profile-loyalty-details##xdm:pointsExpir: Point balance expiring as of the associated expiration date.
Date on which the given portion of the loyalty points expire.
profile-loyalty-details##xdm:pointsRedee: Amount of points applied toward a purchase or otherwise redeemed.
profile-loyalty-details##xdm:program##de: This should define the loyalty progam in which a visitor is enrolled.
profile-loyalty-details##xdm:upgradeDate: Date which the customer was upgraded to the next tier level.
profile-loyalty-details##xdm:status##des: Captures the visitor's loyalty progam status, such as active, disabled, or suspended.
profile-loyalty-details##xdm:tier##descr: Captures the loyalty progam tier in which a visitor is enrolled.
profile-loyalty-details##xdm:loyalty##de: Captures details related to the customer's loyalty rewards.
profile-loyalty-details##description: Loyalty details such as ID, points, join date, program, and status.
profile-media-subscription##xdm:channels: Records the number of channels included with the media subscription.
profile-media-subscription##xdm:serviceN: Records the name of the streaming service.
profile-media-subscription##xdm:promotio: Flags if the streaming service was added as part of a promotion.
Tracks the length of the promotion, in months, if the streaming service was added as part of a promotion.
profile-media-subscription##xdm:streamin: Array of all streaming services included with the subscription.
profile-media-subscription##description: media subscription plan details including number of channels & included streaming services.
profile-mobile-plan-details##xdm:ID##des: Captures the ID for the accessory.
profile-mobile-plan-details##xdm:pricing: Captures if the device will be paid for in installments or full retail price.
profile-mobile-plan-details##xdm:earlyUp: Captures if the customer opts into early upgrades.
profile-mobile-plan-details##xdm:insuran: Captures if the customer opts into device insurance.
profile-mobile-plan-details##xdm:planLev: Captures the name of the mobile plan assigned to this device.
profile-mobile-plan-details##xdm:phoneNu: Captures the phone number assigned to this device.
profile-mobile-plan-details##xdm:portedN: Captures if the customer ports their number from another carrier.
profile-mobile-plan-details##xdm:media5G: Captures if the device is eligible for 5G Access.
profile-mobile-plan-details##xdm:mediaRo: Captures if the device plan includes rollover data.
profile-mobile-plan-details##xdm:mediaMo: Captures if the device plan includes mobile hotspot ability.
profile-mobile-plan-details##xdm:mediaCl: Captures if the device plan includes cloud data storage.
profile-mobile-plan-details##xdm:hdVideo: Captures if the device plan includes HD video.
profile-mobile-plan-details##xdm:devices: Array of line details and their associated devices.
profile-mobile-plan-details##xdm:accesso: Array of accessories associated with the plan.
profile-mobile-plan-details##description: Mobile plan details including number of lines, data rates, cost, etc.
profile-other-work-details##xdm:otherAdd: Other/Alternate postal address of the person.
profile-other-work-details##xdm:otherPho: Other/Alternate phone number of the person.
profile-other-work-details##xdm:departme: Department name where the person works.
profile-other-work-details##description: This mixin is used to capture information regarding additional/other work-related details of the individual such as work address, work email, work phone number, and organizations to which the profile belongs.
profile-owning-entities##xdm:orgUnit##de: The unit within the organization owning the profile. This can be used to reference the organization details maintained in another dataset.
profile-owning-entities##xdm:geoUnit##de: The geographical unit within the organization owning the profile. This can be used to reference the geographical information maintained in another dataset.
profile-owning-entities##description: Geographical unit information such as labels, organization name, and geographical unit name.
profile-person-details-v2##xdm:person##d: An individual actor, contact, or owner.
profile-person-details-v2##xdm:firstName: The first segment of the name in the writing order most commonly accepted in the language of the name. In many cultures this is the preferred personal or given name. The `firstName` and `lastName` properties have been introduced to maintain compatibility with existing systems that model names in a simplified, non-semantic, and non-internationalizable way. Using `xdm:fullName` is always preferable.
profile-person-details-v2##xdm:lastName#: The last segment of the name in the writing order most commonly accepted in the language of the name. In many cultures this is the inherited family name, surname, patronymic, or matronymic name. The `firstName` and `lastName` properties have been introduced to maintain compatibility with existing systems that model names in a simplified, non-semantic, and non-internationalizable way. Using `xdm:fullName` is always preferable.
profile-person-details-v2##xdm:middleNam: Middle, alternative, or additional names supplied between the first name and last name.
profile-person-details-v2##xdm:courtesyT: Normally an abbreviation of a persons title, honorific, or salutation. The `courtesyTitle` is used in front of full or last name in opening texts. For example, Mr. Miss. or Dr.
profile-person-details-v2##xdm:suffix##d: A group of letters provided after a person's name to provide additional information. The `suffix` is used at the end of someones name. For example Jr., Sr., M.D., PhD, I, II, III, etc.
profile-person-details-v2##xdm:fullName#: The full name of the person, in writing order most commonly accepted in the language of the name.
profile-person-details-v2##xdm:birthDate: The full date a person was born.
profile-person-details-v2##xdm:birthDayA: The day and month a person was born, in the format MM-DD. This field should be used when the day and month of a person's birth is known, but not the year.
profile-person-details-v2##xdm:birthYear: The year a person was born including the century, for example, 1983.  This field should be used when only the person's age is known, not the full birth date.
profile-person-details-v2##xdm:maritalSt: Describes a person's relationship with a significant other.
profile-person-details-v2##xdm:nationali: The legal relationship between a person and their state represented using the ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 code.
profile-person-details-v2##xdm:taxId##de: The Tax / Fiscal ID of the person, e.g. the TIN in the US or the CIF/NIF in Spain.
profile-person-details-v2##description: Demographic information such as name, gender, and birth date of an individual.
profile-person-details##xdm:person##desc: An individual actor, contact, or owner.
profile-person-details##description: Demographic information such as name, gender, and birth date of an individual.
profile-personal-details##description: Contact information for an individual person such as home address, phone number, fax, and email.
profile-personal-finance-details##xdm:ac: Total number of account (financial) cards assigned to a user.
profile-personal-finance-details##xdm:as: Captures the beneficiary(s) assigned to the account.
profile-personal-finance-details##xdm:sc: Refers to a number between 300-850 that depicts a consumer's creditworthiness.
profile-personal-finance-details##xdm:pr: Refers to the credit bureau responsible for providing the credit score.
profile-personal-finance-details##xdm:sc: Date when the score was reported.
profile-personal-finance-details##xdm:em: Tracks the employment status of the user.
profile-personal-finance-details##xdm:ID: Array of financial account IDs assigned to the user.
profile-personal-finance-details##xdm:ha: Flag determining if the account has a beneficiary assigned.
profile-personal-finance-details##xdm:pe: Financial details including transactions, accounts, and applications.
profile-personal-finance-details##descri: Personal finance details such as financial account details, credit score, and tax bracket.
profile-personal-tax-profile-details##xd: Refers to a filing status for married couples that have wed before the end of the tax year.
Refers to married couples who choose to record their respective incomes, exemptions, and deductions on separate tax returns.
Users designed as head of household if they pay more than half the cost of supporting and housing a qualifying person.
Refers to the combined gross income of all members of a household.
Refers to a taxpayer who is unmarried and does not qualify for any other filing status.
Refers to a range of incomes subject to a certain income tax rate.
Financial details including transactions, accounts, and applications.
profile-personal-tax-profile-details##de: Personal tax details such as filing statuses and tax bracket.
profile-phones##description: Phone number such as fax, mobile, home, and work.
profile-preferences-details##xdm:preferr: Describes the preferred system of communication used by the profile. Language codes are expressed in BCP 47 format.
profile-preferences-details##xdm:emailFo: Email format preferred by the profile. This can be rich text or plain text.
profile-preferences-details##xdm:timeZon: Describes which time zone the profile is present in, most frequently the time zone preferred by the profile. Time zones are expressed according to the IETF tz database: https://www.ietf.org/timezones/tzdb-2016i/tz-link.htm
profile-preferences-details##xdm:optInOu: Describes a users opting in and out preferences for communication by medium and communication type.
profile-preferences-details##description: Preferences such as opt-in and opt-out, time zone, preferred language, and email format.
profile-privacy##xdm:timestamp##descript: Timestamp of the received opt-out signal.
profile-privacy##xdm:privacyOptOuts##des: Encapsulates different opt-out types for data privacy (deprecated).
profile-privacy##xdm:consentTimestamp##d: Timestamp (RFC3339) when this identity presented consent information
profile-privacy##xdm:consentString##desc: Consent string and its specification. This can help reading application to use appropriate library.
profile-privacy##xdm:identityIABConsent#: Consent collected for an identity via consent management services.
profile-privacy##xdm:identityPrivacyInfo: Captured privacy information for identities in profile.
profile-privacy##description: Record the IAB TCF 2.0 string in a user's profile.
profile-push-details##xdm:pushNotificati: Push notification tokens are used to communicate with applications that are installed on devices or SaaS application accounts.
profile-push-details##description: Information regarding push notifications, such as mobile application and device details.
profile-push-notification-details##xdm:t: Valid push token for the given push platform.
profile-push-notification-details##xdm:p: Push provider, e.g. apns or fcm
profile-push-notification-details##xdm:b: Indicates whether the push token is blacklisted. Deprecated due to new guidance on key names, use blocklisted instead.
Indicates whether the push token is blocked by the push provider. Deprecated due to new guidance on key names, use denylisted instead.
profile-push-notification-details##xdm:d: Indicates whether the push token is blocked by the push provider.
profile-push-notification-details##xdm:a: Unique Identifier for the mobile application.
profile-push-notification-details##xdm:i: The identity associated with this token before profile stitching. Deprecated due to typo, use xdm:identity instead.
The identity associated with this token before profile stitching.
profile-push-notification-details##xdm:p: Push details array containing notification info required to send mobile push notification to a specific mobile application on a given device.
profile-push-notification-details##descr: Information regarding push notifications, such as mobile application and device details.
profile-segmentation##description: Segment membership information such as including which segments the individual belongs to, the last qualification time, and when the membership is valid until.
profile-subscriptions##xdm:subscriptions: Subscriptions that the profile is entitled to including terminated, expired, or exhausted subscriptions.
profile-subscriptions##description: Subscription information such as device, environment, and subscriber data.
profile-telecom-subscription##xdm:respon: Identifier for the person responsible for the subscription, which typically could be their device phone number.
profile-telecom-subscription##xdm:subscr: Indicates the type of telecom subscription in which the customer is enrolled.
profile-telecom-subscription##xdm:bundle: Captures the name of any type of subscription bundle in which the customer is enrolled, such as 'Internet + TV'.
profile-telecom-subscription##xdm:subscr: Extension of the subscription data type to include subscription length, fees, status, etc.
profile-telecom-subscription##xdm:activa: Tracks the date in which the telecom subscription was activated.
profile-telecom-subscription##xdm:deacti: Tracks the date in which the telecom subscription was deactivated.
profile-telecom-subscription##xdm:equipm: Captures any equipment fees for items such as routers, modems, recievers, etc.
Tracks if a customer has opted-in to equipment insurance for the subscription.
profile-telecom-subscription##descriptio: Collects all generic details related to a customer's telecom subscription plan, including pricing, package, and included features.
profile-test-profile##xdm:testProfile##d: Indicates the `profile` record is for use in testing and verification purposes and should not be automatically included in normal operations.
profile-test-profile##description: Use to indicate that the profile record is in use for testing, verification, and should not be automatically included in normal operations.
profile-user-account-details##xdm:contac: Extension of the Personal Profile data type.
profile-user-account-details##xdm:startD: Date when the account was opened.
profile-user-account-details##xdm:status: This should describe the current status of the account
profile-user-account-details##xdm:accoun: Captures the user account type, if applicable.
profile-user-account-details##xdm:produc: Product, shopping, or experience preferences such as gender, color pref, seat/aisle, king/double bed, etc.
profile-user-account-details##xdm:alertS: Captures whether or not alerts have been enabled for the account.
profile-user-account-details##xdm:autopa: Captures whether or not the account has been enrolled in autopay.
profile-user-account-details##xdm:userAc: Loyalty details, preferences, login processes, and other account preferences.
profile-work-details##description: Work-related details of a person such as work address, work email, work phone number, and organizations to which the person belongs.
segmentdefinition-expression##xdm:expres: Type of expression, for example, PQL, Query Service, or Adobe Audience Manager.
segmentdefinition-expression##xdm:mimeTy: Mime type of the expression. For example, pql/text or application/sql.
segmentdefinition-expression##xdm:value#: Actual expression string. The syntax of expression will depend upon specified mime type.
segmentdefinition-expression##descriptio: Segment expression data such as expression type, mime type, and expression value.
external-source-system-audit-details##ti: External Source System Audit Details Mixin
external-source-system-audit-details##de: Mixin which defines a set a audit properties for extenal sources. It's strongly encouraged to use this mixin given the asynchronous nature of profile ingestion.
identitymap##description: Defines a map containing a set of end user identities, keyed on either namespace integration code or the namespace ID of the identity.  The values of the map are an array, meaning that more than one identity of each namespace may be carried.
person-identifier##description: Used to store Person ID for an entity.
